DOC.brief_summary: Investigation of the clinical condition and safety in patients with cervical dystonia
DOC.brief_title: Post-marketing Surveillance of Administration of Botulinum Toxin Type B(NerBloc)-Investigation of the Clinical Condition and Safety in Patients With Cervical Dystonia
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patients with cervical dystonia Exclusion criteria: The patients who participated in this surveillance in the past
